name: 4×8 Linear Progression — ~8 min
overview_and_execution: Perform 4 sets of 8 reps with the same weight. If you complete all sets, add weight next session. Rest ~60–90s. Emphasize consistent form.
example_application: Lat Pulldown 4×8 @ 120 lb. Next session attempt 125 lb if all sets were completed at 120 lb.
important_notes: Simple linear approach for muscle growth. Manage rest carefully. Once progress slows, consider a brief deload or rep range change.
